description: Experience Wood Green’s transformation through past projects, ongoing activities and future plan, through the community voices that are helping to shape the neighbourhood.

factsheet.heading: Wood Green Reimagined
paragraphs: Join us for a guided tour to explore how Wood Green’s voices are contributing to reimaging the neighbourhood. You’ll gain insight into recently completed placemaking projects, including the award-winning, co-designed Rising Green Youth Hub by Freehaus, co-designed murals and pocket parks designed by Muf. During the tour we will also explore ongoing regeneration projects such as the refurbishment of the Civic Centre and the exciting plans ahead included in Shaping Wood Green.

Haringey Council has worked closely with local communities and stakeholders to develop Shaping Wood Green, a vision for Wood Green underpinned by six key themes for improvement and five placemaking areas of transformation. This is our collective vision for what Wood Green could become.
The tour begins outside the Civic Centre and finishes at Rising Green Youth Hub.

location.address: tour starts outside Civic Centre - 255 High Rd, N22 8LE

name: Wood Green Reimagined
